body:
As a lover of animals I see it as my duty to point out that wasn't a possum... that was a honey badger. 
Also, I'm with ultralungs. I don't really like the chapter by chapter releases as much

Aww man the mc's girl got pulled in the mess and shes actually innocent compared to the rest. I hope nothing bad happens to her.
MC is at a disadvantage now and directory lady is stepping up the game. Also glad chapters are getting released in chapter by chapter. Makes it a good read
I hate how the chapter are released like this now, there’s gonna be endless chapters to keep in order now as opposed to having the one full manhwa
Everyone has a weakness but that bitch still trying hard huh😏 looks very fun for me
I love the suspens ont this saga
